mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO log_pcp_user_monthly_mexico (salesId, dealerId, distributor, clientKey, category, mac, firstName, lastName, email, phone, post_code, post_address, paymentType, cardNumber, expirationDate, securityKey, zip_code, billing_address, deposit, first_pay, month_pay, svc_charge, ld_commission, lde_commission, dealer_commission, sales_commission, createTime, activateTime, expiresTime, status, country, region, city, timeZone, lastOnLineTime, express, device_model, rom_version, ui_version) VALUES (#{salesId}, #{dealerId}, #{distributor}, #{clientKey}, #{category}, #{mac}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{postCode}, #{postAddress}, #{paymentType}, #{cardNumber}, #{expirationDate}, #{securityKey}, #{zipCode}, #{billingAddress}, #{deposit}, #{firstPay}, #{monthPay}, #{svcCharge}, #{ldCommission}, #{ldeCommission}, #{dealerCommission}, #{salesCommission}, #{createTime}, #{activateTime}, #{expiresTime}, #{status}, #{country}, #{region}, #{city}, #{timeZone}, #{lastOnLineTime}, #{express}, #{deviceModel}, #{romVersion}, #{uiVersion})

INSERT IGNORE INTO log_pcp_user_monthly_mexico (salesId, dealerId, distributor, clientKey, category, mac, firstName, lastName, email, phone, post_code, post_address, paymentType, cardNumber, expirationDate, securityKey, zip_code, billing_address, deposit, first_pay, month_pay, svc_charge, ld_commission, lde_commission, dealer_commission, sales_commission, createTime, activateTime, expiresTime, status, country, region, city, timeZone, lastOnLineTime, express, device_model, rom_version, ui_version) VALUES
(#{authRentUserInfo.salesId}, #{authRentUserInfo.dealerId}, #{authRentUserInfo.distributor}, #{authRentUserInfo.clientKey}, #{authRentUserInfo.category}, #{authRentUserInfo.mac}, #{authRentUserInfo.firstName}, #{authRentUserInfo.lastName}, #{authRentUserInfo.email}, #{authRentUserInfo.phone}, #{authRentUserInfo.postCode}, #{authRentUserInfo.postAddress}, #{authRentUserInfo.paymentType}, #{authRentUserInfo.cardNumber}, #{authRentUserInfo.expirationDate}, #{authRentUserInfo.securityKey}, #{authRentUserInfo.zipCode}, #{authRentUserInfo.billingAddress}, #{authRentUserInfo.deposit}, #{authRentUserInfo.firstPay}, #{authRentUserInfo.monthPay}, #{authRentUserInfo.svcCharge}, #{authRentUserInfo.ldCommission}, #{authRentUserInfo.ldeCommission}, #{authRentUserInfo.dealerCommission}, #{authRentUserInfo.salesCommission}, #{authRentUserInfo.createTime}, #{authRentUserInfo.activateTime}, #{authRentUserInfo.expiresTime}, #{authRentUserInfo.status}, #{authRentUserInfo.country}, #{authRentUserInfo.region}, #{authRentUserInfo.city}, #{authRentUserInfo.timeZone}, #{authRentUserInfo.lastOnLineTime}, #{authRentUserInfo.express}, #{authRentUserInfo.deviceModel}, #{authRentUserInfo.romVersion}, #{authRentUserInfo.uiVersion})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM log_pcp_user_monthly_mexico WHERE mac=#{mac}
SELECT * FROM log_pcp_user_monthly_mexico WHERE id > 0 AND log_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY activateTime DESC
